metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7566 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Linux kernel 4.15 has a Buffer Overflow via anSNDRV_SEQ_IOCTL_SET_CLIENT_POOL ioctl write operation to /dev/snd/seq by alocal user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7566` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-127.153
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-127.153
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-127.153
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1090-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1090.98
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1093-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1093.98
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1060.69
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
